data.title: Bitcoin Tracks Stocks Higher With Crypto Traders Staying on Edge
data.description: The original cryptocurrency began to recover over the weekend after slumping to a seven-month low of $80,554 on Friday.  The wider crypto market is in a pronounced slump despite surging institutional adoption and a series of policy wins pushed for by US President Donald Trump, who has embraced the industry.  Technology stocks drove an advance in global equities on Monday as traders kicked off a data-packed week more optimistic that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in December.
